Producer: Luc Besson, Pascal Caucheteux, Pierre-Ange Le Pogam, Sebastien K. Lemercier, John Merchant
Production Co: EuropaCorp, Why Not Productions, Open City Films
Synopsis: After learning that his girlfriend is expecting their first child, blue-collar Sully (Ethan Hawke) decides to rob local mob boss Parmie Tarzo (Vincent D'Onofrio). Tarzo, whose campaign to save Staten Island Forest serves as a front for his illegal activities, relies on Jasper (Seymour Cassel) to make his enemies disappear. But Jasper, a deaf-mute deli worker, is growing old and wants out of his dangerous job. Sully's plan sets off a chain of events that quickly gets out of hand.
Title: Staten Island
